attributes.action: Ensure the elderly and the people with Disabilities get free hospital transport.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We petition the Prime Minister to ensure that elderly patients, people with disabilities and  Cancer patients are provided with free hospital transport.  

The hospitals used in North Dorset are Dorchester, Salisbury and Yeovil two are over 30 miles away from Gillingham. Dorset.  The only way to get to them is by car, if you cannot drive it means a taxi return journey £112 to Salisbury,or go to Salisbury by train means a taxi to the Railway Station/Train/Taxi to hospital then the same route back.
The same method to Yeovil.  There is no way of getting to Dorchester unless you drive.
